definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: After her husband's death, she moved to Alabama.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫去世後，她搬到了阿拉巴馬州。

sentences.english: In Alabama it's illegal to have an ice cream cone in your back pocket at all times.
sentences.chinese: 在阿拉巴馬州，把一筒雪糕放在褲後袋是犯法的。

sentences.english: The Alabama law imitates those in some respects.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉巴馬州的移民法在某些方面模仿了這些州的做法。

sentences.english: Kelly Mumper lives in rural Alabama.
sentences.chinese: 凱莉夢珀家在阿拉巴馬州郊區。

sentences.english: Helen Keller was born in American in June, 1880.
sentences.chinese: 1880年，海倫凱勒出生於美國阿拉巴馬州。

definition: variant of 弗吉尼亞州|弗吉尼亚州/Virginia, US state
